程序包 tools

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    SampleHelper.ImgProcessor
    Must implements public BufferedImage process(BufferedImage img);
    usage: just like FilenameFilter
    String[] myFiles = directory.list(new FilenameFilter() {
    public boolean accept(File directory, String fileName) {
    return fileName.endsWith(".txt");
    }
    });
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ColorPaletteReader  
    LabelGenerator  
    NativeUtils
    A simple library class which helps with loading dynamic libraries stored in the JAR archive.
    SampleHelper
    extend image samples by random crop
    jpgs and pngs only
    spriteGenerator
    generate a sprite image of fixed size.
    TFUtils
